channel.description: Recent content in Daylight on thomjiji

item.title: Daylight 添加 ARRI Look Library & ALF-2 v5 DRT Family
item.description: 操作步骤 将 ARRI Look Library 的 zip 解压，把里面的多个 cub 和 fllook 文件平摊到这个路径：/Library/Application Support/FilmLight/looks 将 ALF-2 v5 DRT Family 的 zip 解压，把里面的 cub 和 fltransform 平摊在这个路径：/Library/Application Support/FilmLight/etc/colourspaces 打开 Daylight，完成。 Reference ARRI Colour Workflow in Baselight ACES and Baselight ARRI Look Library and ALF-2 v5 DRT Family Download
